name: Quill
appearance: Angular features, ink-blue robes stitched with sluice-math; his left hand is a translucent prosthetic of water held in braided charms that ripple when he gestures.
character: Precise, stoic, and pragmatic; compassion expressed as infrastructure and schedules rather than embraces.
talents: Listens to sluice-song as others hear music
Eidetic recall of river levels by season
flaws: Loses memories to a private vow each flood season
dreams: Dredge and stabilize the Sunken Charterstone
Discover the unknown note one gate still answers to
secrets: Gave up memories of his first mentor to seal a pact with a river spirit
Keeps a hidden culvert map that could drain the island in hours
Uses clarity sap to patch his fading recollections
